table.name: contact_group
table.description: The contact_group table associates individual person contacts to a group contact (nonperson).  By creating this association, it allows settings of attributes such as interest in particular event notifications to be set at the group level, so that is does not need to be set at the individual level.

columns.name: GROUP_CONTACT_GID
columns.description: Valid only if contact_type = 'GROUP'.  This is a non-person contact which is used to group individuals together who share interest in notifications, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_GID
columns.description: The contact GID references a person contact which will inherit notifications, etc. from it's contact group.  A contact may belong to more than one contact group.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
